title: Sen. Graham asks if Rod Rosenstein should recuse himself from Mueller probe
content: Washington Times columnist Tammy Bruce and Fox News contributor Byron York discusses how Senator Lindsey Graham (R-S.C.) asked Deputy Attorney General Rod Rosenstein if the DOJ official should recuse himself from the Mueller investigation.        The post appeared first on RocketNews | Top News Stories From Around the Globe .
